# This file was generated, DO NOT edit, you WILL lose the stuff here if someone triggers generation again.

balanced_column = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 4
    group = column

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        is_flanking = no
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 3

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 1

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 2

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = twod
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = funnel
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = funnel
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.8
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.8
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.4
    pikemen_offensive = -0.8
    pikemen_defensive = 0.7
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.8
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.9
    knights_offensive = -0.8
    knights_defensive = 0.7
    archers_offensive = -0.9
    archers_defensive = 1.6


    enemy = {
        group = funnel
        factor = 0.5
    }

    enemy = {
        group = plane
        factor = 1
    }
}

kinetic_column = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 4
    group = column

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        is_flanking = no
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 3

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 1

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 2

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = twod
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = funnel
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = funnel
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.6
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 2.3
    pikemen_offensive = -0.6
    pikemen_defensive = 1.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.7
    light_cavalry_defensive = 1.7

    enemy = {
        group = funnel

    enemy = {
        group = plane
        factor = 1

defensive_column = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 4
    group = column

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        is_flanking = no
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 3

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 1

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }

        }

                flank_has_tactic = funnel

        }

        additive_modifier = {

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = funnel
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }

            value = -30

                trait = frigate_pilot

        }

            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }

balanced_sphere = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 6

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 14
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 14
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = range_generalist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = narrow_flank_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.3
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    pikemen_offensive = 0.0
    pikemen_defensive = 0.2
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.1
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.2

    sprite = 1
    days = 6

    trigger = {

        days >= 1

            martial >= 14

balanced_cone = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 12
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 12
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = experimenter
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = omnicidal_maniac
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 1.0
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    pikemen_offensive = 1.0
    pikemen_defensive = 0.2
    light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.3
    knights_offensive = 1.0
    knights_defensive = 0.3
    archers_offensive = 0.5
    archers_defensive = 0.3


    enemy = {
        group = plane
        factor = 1
    }
}

        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 12
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 12
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = frigate_pilot
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = experimenter
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = omnicidal_maniac
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
    light_infantry_defensive = 1.6
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.5
    pikemen_offensive = 0.0
    pikemen_defensive = 1.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_defensive = 1.2
    knights_offensive = 0.0
    knights_defensive = 1.4
    archers_offensive = 0.9
    archers_defensive = 1.0


    enemy = {
        group = plane
        factor = 1
    }
}

boarding_cone = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 12
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 12
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = experimenter
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = omnicidal_maniac
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    pikemen_offensive = -0.2
    pikemen_defensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.1
    knights_offensive = -0.2
    knights_defensive = 0.1
    archers_offensive = 4.5
    archers_defensive = 0.1


    enemy = {
        group = plane
        factor = 1
    }
}

balanced_funnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 7
    group = funnel

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 15
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 8

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = cone
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 15
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = shock_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 40
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.4
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 1.1
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.2
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.2
    pikemen_offensive = 1.1
    pikemen_defensive = 0.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = 1.1
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.2
    knights_offensive = 1.1
    knights_defensive = 0.2
    archers_offensive = 0.5
    archers_defensive = 0.3


    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 2
    }
}

laser_funnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 7
    group = funnel

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 15
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 8

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = cone
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 15
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = shock_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 40
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.4
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.4
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 3.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    pikemen_offensive = -0.8
    pikemen_defensive = 0.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.3
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.1
    knights_offensive = 0.8
    knights_defensive = 0.1
    archers_offensive = 0.1
    archers_defensive = 0.3


    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 2
    }
}

kinetic_funnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 7
    group = funnel

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 15
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 8

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = cone
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 15
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = shock_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 40
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.4
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 2.8
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.5
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.8
    pikemen_offensive = 3.0
    pikemen_defensive = 0.4
    light_cavalry_offensive = 1.9
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.9
    knights_offensive = 1.5
    knights_defensive = 1.4
    archers_offensive = 0.1
    archers_defensive = 0.2


    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 2
    }
}

defensive_funnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 7
    group = funnel

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 15
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 8

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = cone
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 15
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = shock_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = frigate_pilot
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 40
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.4
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.1
    light_infantry_defensive = 1.5
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.4
    pikemen_offensive = 0.1
    pikemen_defensive = 1.0
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.1
    light_cavalry_defensive = 1.1
    knights_offensive = 0.1
    knights_defensive = 1.3
    archers_offensive = 0.9
    archers_defensive = 0.9


    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 2
    }
}

boarding_funnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 7
    group = funnel

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 15
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {

                trait = defensive_leader
            }

                enemy = yes
            }

                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    pikemen_offensive = -0.2
    pikemen_defensive = -0.1

    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 2

balanced_echelon = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 3

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        is_flanking = yes
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 13
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = column
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 13
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = flanker
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = pursuit_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 1.0
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    pikemen_offensive = 1.0
    pikemen_defensive = 0.2
    light_cavalry_offensive = 1.0
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.3
    knights_offensive = 1.0
    knights_defensive = 0.3
    archers_offensive = 0.5
    archers_defensive = 0.3


    enemy = {
        group = column
        factor = 1
    }

    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 2
    }
}

    sprite = 1
    days = 3

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        is_flanking = yes
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 13
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {

                flank_has_tactic = column
            } }

                flank_has_tactic = encircled

    sprite = 1
    days = 3

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1

        flank_has_leader = yes

            martial >= 13

defensive_echelon = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 3

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        is_flanking = yes
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 13
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = column
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 13
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = frigate_pilot
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = flanker
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = pursuit_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
    light_infantry_defensive = 1.6
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.5
    pikemen_offensive = 0.0
    pikemen_defensive = 1.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_defensive = 1.2
    knights_offensive = 0.0
    knights_defensive = 1.4
    archers_offensive = 0.9
    archers_defensive = 1.0


    enemy = {
        group = column
        factor = 1
    }

    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 2
    }
}

    sprite = 1
    days = 3

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        is_flanking = yes
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 13

    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {

                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30

                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    pikemen_offensive = -0.2
    pikemen_defensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.1

    knights_defensive = 0.1
    archers_offensive = 4.5
    archers_defensive = 0.1


    enemy = {
        group = column

        group = encircled

    }

balanced_cube = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.3
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    pikemen_offensive = 0.0
    pikemen_defensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.1
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
    knights_offensive = -0.1
    knights_defensive = 0.0
    archers_offensive = -0.3
    archers_defensive = 0.1


    enemy = {
        group = rearattack
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

laser_cube = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = organizer
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.8
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.8
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    pikemen_offensive = -0.9
    pikemen_defensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.4
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.1
    knights_offensive = -0.2
    knights_defensive = -0.1
    archers_offensive = -0.5
    archers_defensive = 0.1


    enemy = {
        group = rearattack
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

kinetic_cube = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = organizer
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = kinetic_master
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.3
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.6
    pikemen_offensive = 0.9
    pikemen_defensive = 0.4
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.8
    knights_offensive = 0.0
    knights_defensive = 1.2
    archers_offensive = -0.5
    archers_defensive = 0.0


    enemy = {
        group = rearattack
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

defensive_cube = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = frigate_pilot
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = organizer
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = long_range_combat_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    light_infantry_defensive = 1.0
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.9
    pikemen_offensive = -0.5
    pikemen_defensive = 0.8
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.8
    knights_offensive = -0.6
    knights_defensive = 0.8
    archers_offensive = -0.1
    archers_defensive = 0.4


    enemy = {
        group = rearattack
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.7
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.1
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    pikemen_offensive = -0.6
    pikemen_defensive = -0.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.1
    knights_offensive = -0.7
    knights_defensive = -0.2
    archers_offensive = 1.8
    archers_defensive = -0.1


    enemy = {
        group = rearattack
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

balanced_scattered = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.3
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.5
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.3
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    pikemen_offensive = 0.1
    pikemen_defensive = 0.4
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.2
    knights_offensive = 0.3
    knights_defensive = 0.1
    archers_offensive = -0.3
    archers_defensive = 0.1


    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 1
    }

    enemy = {
        group = rearattack
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

laser_scattered = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 14
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 14
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = kinetic_master
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.8
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.5
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.6
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    pikemen_offensive = -0.9
    pikemen_defensive = 0.4
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.1
    knights_offensive = 0.1
    knights_defensive = 0.0
    archers_offensive = -0.5
    archers_defensive = 0.1


    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 1
    }

    enemy = {
        group = rearattack
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

kinetic_scattered = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 14
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 14
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = kinetic_master
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = kinetic_master
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 1.4
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.8
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.6
    pikemen_offensive = 1.1
    pikemen_defensive = 0.7
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.6
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.8
    knights_offensive = 0.4
    knights_defensive = 1.1
    archers_offensive = -0.5
    archers_defensive = 0.0


    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 1
    }

    enemy = {
        group = rearattack
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

defensive_scattered = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial >= 14
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial >= 14
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = frigate_pilot
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = kinetic_master
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = long_range_combat_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.3
    light_infantry_defensive = 2.0
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.3
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.2
    pikemen_offensive = -0.4
    pikemen_defensive = 1.5
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.4
    light_cavalry_defensive = 1.0
    knights_offensive = -0.4
    knights_defensive = 1.0
    archers_offensive = -0.1
    archers_defensive = 0.5


    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 1
    }

    enemy = {
        group = rearattack
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

boarding_scattered = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 5

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = rearattack
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.5
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.5
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.1
    pikemen_offensive = -0.6
    pikemen_defensive = 0.3
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.5
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
    knights_offensive = -0.5
    knights_defensive = -0.1
    archers_offensive = 1.5
    archers_defensive = -0.1


    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 1
    }

    enemy = {
        group = rearattack
        factor = 0.5
    }
}
